Sentece: Patients using clopidogrel had a mean predicted area under the plasma-concentration-time curve (AUC0-24 ) of 174.7 ng h/mL (SD: ±112.9 ng h/mL) versus 142.2 ng h/mL (SD: ±92.6 ng h/mL) in patients without clopidogrel.
Title: Exposure and response analysis of aleglitazar on cardiovascular risk markers and safety outcomes: An analysis of the AleCardio trial.
Name: Aleglitazar

Title: Metabolism, excretion, and pharmacokinetics of [14c]-radiolabeled aleglitazar: a phase I, nonrandomized, open-label, single-center, single-dose study in healthy male volunteers.
